channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Astronomers discover a planet that's rapidly disintegrating, producing a comet-like tail
item.description: A planet 140 light-years from Earth is rapidly coming apart due to its close proximity to its star. The roasting planet is effectively evaporating awa...

item.title: Transformable flat-to-shape objects created using sewing technology

item.title: Insects are disappearing due to agriculture -- and many other drivers, new research reveals

item.title: Adolescents who sleep longer perform better at cognitive tasks

item.title: Atmospheric winds have surprising impact on ocean weather
